asela kuruluwanshamewara mayi dinayata prathama ranil -sajith dedena athara wishesha hamuwak pawathwa mayi dinaya ha premadasa guna samaruwa pilibandawa pawathna mathabhedaya nima kirimata pakshaye jyeshta manthri pirisak gath uthsahaya wyartha wi thibe.mayi dinayedi ranil - sajith dedena wen wenwa thama balaya penwimata uthsaha kirimen e.ja.pa. pil bedima thawath uthsanna wiya haki bawa penwa di athi mema pirisa ee pilibandawa awadhanaya yomu kara ekangathawakata paminena lesa yojana kara atha.premadasa guna samaru uthsawaya pelapaliyak da sahithawa sanwidhanaya kirimata sajith parshwaya me wana witath katayuthu yoda atha.

mema warthawa thula nirikshana 21k saha nirdesha 125k sandahanwa athayi manthri lasantha alagiyawanna mahatha pawasiya. 2018-2-23 dina sita 2018-10-12 dakwa kalaya thula rajaye ginum pilibanda karaka sabhawa wisin pawathwana lada wimarshana 13k ha wishesha wimarshana 3kata adalawa ek ek pradhana ganan dime niladhariya wisin idiripath karana lada wachika ha likhitha pahadili kirim, ee sandaha karaka sabhawa wisin sidu karana lada nirikshana ha laba dena lada nirdesha da karaka sabhawa wisin nirikshanaya karana lada podu nirikshana da mema warthawe anthargathawa pawathi.
